label: ham
subject: Re: Samba 3.0.25a Available for Download
body: 7 (return) [ These embassies had been sent to Constantius. Ammianus, who unwarily deviates into gross flattery, must have forgotten the length of the way, and the short duration of the reign of Julian. ÑÑGothos s¾pe fallaces et perfidos; hostes qu¾rere se meliores aiebat: illis enim sufficere mercators Galatas per quos ubique sine conditionis discrimine venumdantur. (Ammian. xxii. 7.) Within less than fifteen years, these Gothic slaves threatened and subdued their masters.]
